name: Unwinged Platzzle
description:
Resolve puzzles to help an unwinged bird across 5 levels : Land, Cavern, Aquatic, Pikes and more. 

Eat some cherries to get to next level with new set of block types.  

Controls : 

  • Keyboard LEFT / RIGHT / DOWN : Move block.
  • Keyboard UP : Rotate block.
  • Click to start the game

This game was made during the 41st Ludum Dare - Compo (48h) competition.

Gamejam rules was :

  • Theme : Combine 2 Incompatible Genres
  • Less than 48h
  • Solo

Source code available on GitHub
